transcript: we wanted to move everything to a project management software because she runs all of her teams on that and then some of the other teams she lets the directors run their teams however they want but as she saw how much more productive her teams were compared to some of the others she basically got on board with all the directors and was like hey I need you to all be in this project management software those teams got on there because she could demonstrate look at how much stuff we get done compared to what you guys get done it was just empirical she's like look and so if she didn't have that and said hey I need you all to use this thing and she didn't do it it wouldn't work very well but because she does it and uses it better than anyone else does everyone else Falls in
